#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<climits>
using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

int main()
{ll t;
scanf("%lld",&t);

while(t--)
{
    ll n;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    
    ll a[n];
    ll maax=0;ll val=INT_MIN;
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
            scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
            
            
            
            }
    maax=a[n-1];
    
    for(ll i=n-2;i>=0;i--)
    {
            val=max(val,maax-a[i]);
            maax=max(maax,a[i]);
            
            }
    
    
  printf("%lld\n",val);
    
  
  
  
}
  //  getch();
    return 0;
}
